children.name: className
children.description: The class name of the drag handles. Defaults to highcharts-drag-handle.

children.name: color
children.description: The fill color of the drag handles.

children.name: cursor
children.description: The mouse cursor to use for the drag handles. By default this is intelligently switching between ew-resize and ns-resize depending on the direction the point is being dragged.

children.name: lineColor
children.description: The line color of the drag handles.

children.name: lineWidth
children.description: The line width for the drag handles.

children.name: pathFormatter
children.description: Function to define the SVG path to use for the drag handles. Takes the point as argument. Should return an SVG path in array format. The SVG path is automatically positioned on the point.

children.name: zIndex
children.description: The z index for the drag handles.
